widget.label: Favorite Icon Settings
widget.tooltip: Icon Shown in your client's tab or location bar.
widget.help: The favorite icon (or antivirus.ico) is the icon shown in your client's browser tab, location bar, bookmark, etc. This form lets you upload your own icon.

widget.label: Icon
widget.tooltip: Define the little icon that appears in the tab, the location bar, bookmarks, or some other locations of your browser.
widget.help: Click Browse... to select a file or drag and drop your favorite icon to replace the current one.

widget.label: Use One Sitewide Favorite Icon
widget.tooltip: Select to only use the sitewide favorite icon
widget.help: By default this flag is checked which means that only the sitewide favorite icon is to be used. This allows us to skip on checking the current page and its types for a antivirus.ico file.

widget.label: Save
widget.tooltip: Click this button to save your changes.
widget.help: Make sure to click the Save button so your changes get commited to the database.

widget.label: Cancel
widget.tooltip: Click here to return to the administration page
widget.help: Changed your mind? Click on this Cancel link to return to the administration page.
